name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Owarai: World of Japanese Comedy
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Owarai: World of Japanese Comedy
long_desc: Owarai is a general term used for Japanese comedy which includes various forms of performances. Students will learn about the various types of unique techniques used in Owarai and also learn purest forms of Owarai like Manzai. They will also learn how some of the techniques are found in mainstream Japanese media like Anime and Movies. Classes will involve watching different comedy pieces and discussions. At the end of the course students will be able to script their own Japanese comedy piece in English.

custom_fields.goals: Students will learn different techniques utilized in Japanese comedy. They will also be able to create a short piece of their own.
custom_fields.key_topics: Different types of Japanese Comedy, Major Techniques in Japanese Comedy
custom_fields.relevance: Introduction to a Japanese culture rarely discussed around the world to increase appreciation in other Japanese media (i.e. shows, anime).
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Occasional Videos and HW to complete
